name: Russian Loose Wave, Body Wave, Straight
description: Russian Extensions is the BEST hair on the market! Our hair is Grade AAAA, with minimum shedding, no tangle, easy to manage. This hair can be straightened, curled, dyed and ombre'd to your liking. We recommend a minimum of 2-3 bundles for a full sew in. We offer this GREAT hair for low low prices!!! Order yours today!

name: Virgin Lace Closures
description: We have closures for Brazilian, Malaysian, Peruvian, Indian. Closures will match any hair texture: Straight, Body Wave, Loose Wave, & Curly. 100% Virgin Human Hair AAAA grade guaranteed to have minimum shedding, soft,& clean. Hair can be dyed, bleached, curled (wanded), & straightened. Weighs 100 grams, measures at about 4x4, needs to be purchased with 2 bundles for a full head sew in
